Okay I got it working. I also have LAN working, it works great, but everyone's names are Skidrow. My question now is how do I change my username?

Ain't no way to get it to work. Fuck sake, hate to diss on hard work(if it works) of the uploader, but post some god-damn instructions on how to crack. The .exe stops responding after I copy the crack.
Right. So I might have rushed off a little bit. Got it to work and after long last, HAWX 2 is available. Thank you for the upload.

i am playing for two hours now...this is the real deal people.black echo's version didn't work for me!!!

Having a tough time getting this to work, keep getting game launger erro code 2 when launching with uplay. Any better instructions ?

brunsquad, for me a Windows restart helped solve the "Ubisoft Game Launcher Error 2" issue. However when I click on the story mode, and the game would begin, after a short time it drops back to the main menu. ...in the options menu, however, I could test the game in the display settings submenu. It looked great. Shame I can't play... Anyone any ideas (except buying the game)? ;-)
help please it need cd key and activation code.
It took 3 years for someone to crack it? I no longer want to play this game it's too old now but thanks for the upload though.
